title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Design for Engineering Education Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency Enhancement Program for Current Workplace Practitioners in Smartphone-Based Learning Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to apply self-regulated learning strategies (metacognition, motivation management, behavioral regulation) to engineering curricula
Learners can design and utilize self-regulated learning assessment tools reflecting industrial field demands
Learners can develop and implement self-regulated learning modules suitable for mobile microlearning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
